properties.address: 2-6 Hopetoun Street, Bathgate, West Lothian EH48 4EU
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th November 2023** 🌟 Join Us for a Cozy Winter Gathering! 🌟 As the winter chill sets in, we are proving a warm and inviting space for the local community. Come and join us, a place where you can relax, unwind, and meet your community whilst keeping those energy bills down at home. What We Offer: 🌟 A warm and welcoming space for families and friends to connect. 🌟 Delicious hot meals and soothing cups of tea or coffee. 🌟 A variety of activities to enjoy, from board games to colouring and puzzles. 🌟 Comfortable couches for those who simply want to curl up with a good book. All of this for free, or any donation if you can. Don't spend your winter evenings alone at home. Come and join us to connect with your community, meet new friends, and make lasting connections. 📅 Date: Tuesdays and Thursdays ⏰ Time: between 4pm and 8pm 📍 Location: 2-6 Hopetoun Street, Bathgate, EH48 4EU For more information and to stay updated on our activities, follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/lodestarscommunityhub) or email us 📨 lodestarseh48@gmail.com Let's make this winter a season of warmth and togetherness in Bathgate.
properties.title: Toastie Toes & Get to Knows
